name: DOUDINGMAN
description:
This is a defensive shooter Roguelite game where you will play as a member of a transport caravan. You'll need to carve a path through the monstrous bandits who are coming for your goods, and you'll turn them into your loot with the weapon in your hand.

The controls are very simple, mostly requiring only up-and-down movement and aiming at enemies. Of course, you can also use skills when needed.

You have a variety of characters to choose from, each with distinct physical qualities and bullet types, along with the option to select a unique skill. In the end, you can create countless variations of tactics using hundreds of different builds.

Utilize the gold coins acquired during battles to permanently enhance yourself.


■ Different types of enemies continuously approach you, and the exhilarating pace gets you into the zone instantly.


■ A wide array of different builds is at your disposal, allowing you the freedom to choose enhancements for your own attributes, bullet strength, and the construction of defense towers, among other options.


■ Defeat the boss, acquire powerful treasures, but occasionally, they also summon a horde of minions.
